Hi {!Opportunity.Contact_First_Name__c},
Congratulations! You have just made the choice to focus on selling more with BigCommerce! We’re excited to power your online store which will get you online faster and better than your competition. There are just a few more steps before you can take advantage of the special offers from our Starter Kit with Intuit QuickBooks.
1. Pick out your FREE premium template
Review the premium templates and pick one you like. They’re all mobile friendly and have SEO built right in to help your search rankings. A BigCommerce expert will help you apply one of the following templates:
Health & Beauty https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/health-and-beauty/
Bright & Bold https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/bright-bold/

Cookies & Cream https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/cookies-cream/

Hawaii https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/hawaii/
Connecticut https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/connecticut/
Alaska https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/alaska/
Indiana https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/indiana/
2. Call us at 844-632-8914 to get assistance with setting up your store
Don’t worry it only takes a few minutes and it’s the best time you will spend so we can ensure your site looks and works right - the first time!
Our experts are ready to help walk you through the following:
Applying your premium template
Setting up QuickBooks for your payments and help you find the QuickBooks Online Integration App
Configuring shipping, taxes, SSL, domain and other settings
Stocking your products (options, SKUs, rules, categories)
Just call 844-632-8914 to get started.
3. Start Selling More!
After that, you’ll be all set to sell your products online and grow your business. With BigCommerce and Intuit QuickBooks, you will be able to focus on turning online shoppers into loyal customers.
We’re looking forward to helping you get started,
The BigCommerce Team
844-632-8914
